episodes.title: 2D1F-123 – A Reunion
episodes.author: Dawn Miceli and Drew Domkus
episodes.summary:
I’ve been sitting on this 2D1F show for a few weeks as I was working on launching Old Dude Skate Co. since we talked about it a bunch. We’re back after a 6 month hiatus and we’re catching up on life and talking about our latest projects… The High Five and Old Dude Skate Co.
